name: Ambrose, Appellant, v. Moffat Coal Company et al.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Ambrose, Appellant, v. Moffat Coal Company et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Hoban.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Myron A. PinJcus, with him Alphonsus L. Casey, for appellant.
Frank M. Walsh, with him J. Hayden Oliver and Franklin B. Celder, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Ambrose, Appellant, v. Moffat Coal Company et al.
Argued January 6, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Myron A. PinJcus, with him Alphonsus L. Casey, for appellant.
Frank M. Walsh, with him J. Hayden Oliver and Franklin B. Celder, for appellees.
March 22, 1948:
